        public static String processSmilies(StringBuffer text)
        Replace the smlies code by the respective URL.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to process
        Returns:
        the parsed text. Note that the StringBuffer you pass as parameter will already have the right contents, as the replaces are done on the instance
